headline: Adobe: Our Top Idea For 2025 Now Trading At A 30% Discount To SaaS Peers
summary: Adobe trades at a discount despite having a superior business model. With a strong balance sheet and stock buybacks planned, Adobe is poised for substantial upside. Read our thesis here.

headline: Stagflation Ahead?
summary: Fed upgraded inflation expectations, and reduced the number of projected cuts in 2025. This brings up the worst-case scenario fear for the market, stagflation.
